original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says: Terrible trouble will come to those foolish prophets. They have not seen any vision from me but they tell people their own ideas.
korean_text: 주 여호와의 말씀에 본 것이 없이 자기 심령을 따라 예언하는 어리석은 선지자에게 화가 있을진저

sentences.original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says:
Terrible trouble will come to those foolish prophets.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 어리석은 선지자들에게 큰 재난이 닥쳐올 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They have not seen any vision from me
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나에게서 어떤 이상도 보지 못했지만

sentences.original_text: but they tell people their own ideas.
